conversationDesc: View discussions about the selected object.
convActionableDesc: Set tracked to enable status and priority for this discussion.
sourceDesc: Add a Source Object to the discussion.
noReplies: Add a reply to the discussion
expandNoCommentsLinkDesc: Add a reply to the discussion.
expandCommentsLinkDesc: Show or add replies to the discussion.
removeSnapshotDesc: Remove the snapshot from this discussion.
participantDesc: Add a participant to the discussion.
followObjDesc: Follow to receive notifications when new discussions or replies are made on the object.
unFollowObjDesc: Unfollow to stop receiving notifications when new discussions or replies are made on the object.
followConvDesc: Follow the discussion to get notified when new replies are created.
unFollowConvDesc: Unfollow the discussion to not get notified when new replies are created.
deleteConvDesc: Delete the discussion including all replies.
participantReadAccessWarningMsg: Participant(s) do not have access to all Source(s).
participantRemovalWarningMsg: Removing yourself as a participant will revoke access to this discussion.
convPrivateMsgDesc: Limit discussion visibility to the participants.
Awp0FeedFilterDesc: View or hide the filters for your feed
createDiscussionDesc: Create a new discussion for the snapshot.
openDiscussionDesc: Open existing discussions for the snapshot.
discussionLocationBreadcrumbWithFiltersS: One discussion found for applied filters
discussionLocationBreadcrumbWithFiltersN: No discussions found for applied filters
